titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: 4 March = illegible note 8 March = no idea s3: address = "par metun"? note under address = "du"? something written over s4: Febr. 7 = "Pact"? May 5 = "Lanson Faurrel"? s5: July 24 = "Altenford"? May 28 = "Honeybrook"? note at bottom = no idea
